title: Soft Dinner Rolls
markdown:
### Summary

Nathan,

I love to use this recipe to make “after thanksgiving” sandwiches. You know the kind with a little of everything on it and somehow it almost tastes better than the day of. I love you dearly.

Mom

### Ingredients 

* 1 cup milk warmed to 110 degrees
* 2 ¼ teaspoons yeast
* 2 tablespoons sugar
* 1 egg
* ¼ cup butter softened to room temperature
* 1 teaspoon salt
* 3 cups flour
* Optional topping:
*  2 tablespoons butter and 1 tablespoon honey
### Preparation

* Bloom milk, yeast, and 1 tablespoon sugar
* Once bloomed add remaining ingredients (1 cup of flour at a time)
* Knead dough for 3 to 5 min (use a standing mixer with dough hook)
* Allow time to rise 1-2 hours and then punch down
* Shape into 12-15 balls and place in a greased baking dish and allow to rise a 2nd time (1 hour)
* Bake at 350 degrees for 20-25 min
* Optional: Top with butter and honey with a brush
